name: mdss
description: Stylesheets for displaying and printing Markdown documents

scripts.build-dev: npm run build-print-dev && npm run build-screen-dev && node-sass --include-path src src/index.scss dist/mdss.css --output-style expanded
scripts.build: npm run build-print && npm run build-screen && node-sass --include-path src src/index.scss dist/mdss.min.css --output-style compressed
